item.title: How to include DotNet.HighCharts in ASP.NET MVC with ViewModels
item.description: Hey, I want to show you how to include DotNet.HighCharts in ASP.NET MVC working with ViewModels. A charting component is always very cool to see on your page and makes normal plain numbers good-looking. Highcharts are available on Codeplex: DotNet.HighChartsI will not dive into this whole ViewModel thing. This is something very common in ASP.NET MVC and can also bee seen in the second blog I am working on: How to avoid ViewBag and ViewDataSo, lets start:
